body: Ok, this is just an insane story. I was curious about page 181, and apparently the old guy is the nurse’s husband. So she’s been fucking the MC and the bad guy. I think the short hair girl at the end is the MC’s gf who was cheating, and she comes back saying she broke up with the other guy. The second girl the MC fucks is the person he got into an accident with. This is one bizarre web, besides that I don’t know specifics of the story.
So....can't really understand what was going on. Did he get revenge in the end and its a happy ending or what? :S
